author: Gregory Carslaw
description:
An Artificer 5e is the inventor or engineer of the Dungeons and Dragons universe, able to craft the perfect magic item for any situation. Their versatility make them appealing to experienced players who love to crunch the numbers of a character build, and their unique tinkerer gimmick makes them a draw for any player who loves tools, robots, guns, and the like. This DnD Artificer class guide covers everything you need to know to get crafting.

Continue reading DnD Artificer 5e class guide
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: DnD Artificer 5e class guide

author: Matt Bassil
description:
In the last big Pokémon Pocket tournament before Eevee Grove graces the scene, a new deck floated to the top, becoming a serious contender to rival the likes of Buzzwole and Silvally.

Continue reading New Pokémon Pocket deck rises to the top on the eve of Eevee set

title: New Pokémon Pocket deck rises to the top on the eve of Eevee set

author: Mollie Russell
description:
Daggerheart, the hot new Dungeons and Dragons rival on the block, shared new playtests on June 24 that are stuffed with additional character options. This includes upgrades to its two previous playtest classes, two brand-new classes for testing, six ancestries, and six community options.

Continue reading DnD rival Daggerheart to add gnomes, witches, assassins, and amnesiacs
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Critical Role campaign 3 cast, episodes, DnD classes, Critical Role cast and characters guide
title: DnD rival Daggerheart to add gnomes, witches, assassins, and amnesiacs

author: Alex Evans
description:
Spicy Truth or Dare questions can turn a classic playground game into a hilarious adult affair. Playing is easy – each player in turn chooses to take on a truth or a dare, and everyone else decides on a cheeky question or an unusual challenge. The hardest part of the game, however, is coming up with enough spicy ideas. This guide offers 150 of the best Truth or Dare questions for adults – plus 40 dares that run from the silly to the scorching, as an added bonus!

Continue reading 150 best dirty Truth or Dare questions for spicy game nights
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games , Couples' board games, Board games for adults
title: 150 best dirty Truth or Dare questions for spicy game nights

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Dinosaurs belong in tabletop wargames - just put any model dinosaur side by side with a 28mm scale miniature and you’ll see how perfect they are together. And there’s no shortage of miniature wargames with dinosaurs in them, whether that’s fantasy dinos in Warhammer, sci-fi dinos in The Drowned Earth, or real dinosaurs in various indie games going all the way back to the 70s. Now Black Site Studios is filling an evolutionary niche that has been empty until now: We Played God is a dinosaur miniature game with the vibes of a Jurassic Park-style disaster movie.

Continue reading At last, someone made a tabletop wargame about dying in Jurassic Park
MORE FROM WARGAMER: The best miniature wargames, A
title: At last, someone made a tabletop wargame about dying in Jurassic Park

author: Mollie Russell
description:
Last Train to Bremen, a rock-and-roll fairytale TTRPG with board game elements, began crowdfunding its physical edition on June 24. Publisher Possum Creek Games (Wanderhome, Yazeba’s Bed and Breakfast) describes the tabletop RPG as “a storytelling game of four arrogant musicians who made a deal with the Devil that backfired horribly”. The classic Liar’s Dice plays a key role in deciding the fate of these musical fugitives.

Continue reading This cutthroat fairytale TTRPG remixes a classic betting board game
MORE FROM WARGAMER: The best tabletop RPGs, D&D classes guide, Best board games
title: This cutthroat fairytale TTRPG remixes a classic betting board game

author: Matt Bassil
description:
The MTG card Jin-Gitaxias is the latest in a long series of price spikes triggered by the massive new Final Fantasy set. I’ve been watching this one tick up in price slowly over the last week or two and now it’s reached a 100% increase, I’ve decided it’s finally time to cover it.

Continue reading Phyrexian Praetor MTG card doubles in price after Final Fantasy release

title: Phyrexian Praetor MTG card doubles in price after Final Fantasy release

author: Timothy Linward
description:
You could win a brand new copy of the sinuous and sinister Fulgrim, Daemon Primarch of the Emperor's Children, just by joining the Wargamer Discord server and taking part in our latest miniature painting competition. All you have to for your chance to win is submit your most elegantly painted model, whether it's from Warhammer 40,000 or any other miniature range. But hurry, the competition closes soon!

Continue reading Win Warhammer 40k's perfect new Fulgrim kit in our community painting contest

title: Win Warhammer 40k's perfect new Fulgrim kit in our community painting contest
